Posts.Content: Jul 26, 2012 08:11PM Sanusi wrote: Hi there, Abby. I cannot begin to imagine the shock you got from your results. I am so sorry. But know it that you will pull through this just like all these responsive Heroines have. You're not alone and there's enough strength in that. don't lose your mind. Let this forum be your lounge. Wishing you all the best and easy treatment. This goes to the rest of you women too. Good luck.
